languages.text: Казалось, что Лорд-капитану изменила е{mf|го|е} извечная удача, но тут на поле боя ворвались скитарии Оптикона-22 и Космические волки Торбальда. Забыв прежнюю рознь, два командира обрушились на нечестивую машину разрушения.

It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.
languages.original_text: Казалось, что Лорд-капитану изменила е{mf|го|е} извечная удача, но тут на поле боя ворвались скитарии Оптикона-22 и Космические волки Торбальда. Забыв прежнюю рознь, два командира обрушились на нечестивую машину разрушения.

traits.locale_text: It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

languages.text: 看起来，舰长大人马上就要在劫难逃了，但就在那个时候，奥普蒂孔22号的护教军与索巴德的太空野狼加入了战局。两位指挥官放下了彼此的嫌隙，一同朝那台邪恶的毁灭兵器发起了攻击。
languages.original_text: It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

traits.locale_text: 看起来，舰长大人马上就要在劫难逃了，但就在那个时候，奥普蒂孔22号的护教军与索巴德的太空野狼加入了战局。两位指挥官放下了彼此的嫌隙，一同朝那台邪恶的毁灭兵器发起了攻击。

languages.text: Alors que la chance incroyable {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} semblait sur le point de tourner, les skitarii d'Opticon-22 et les Space Wolves de Thorbald sont entrés en piste. Oubliant leur querelle, les deux commandants se sont attaqués à cette arme de destruction impie.
languages.original_text: It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

traits.locale_text: Alors que la chance incroyable {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} semblait sur le point de tourner, les skitarii d'Opticon-22 et les Space Wolves de Thorbald sont entrés en piste. Oubliant leur querelle, les deux commandants se sont attaqués à cette arme de destruction impie.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの剛運もそこで尽きるかと思われたが、オプティコン-22のスキタリとトールバルドのスペースウルフたちが戦いに加わった。争いを忘れ、ふたりの司令は不浄の破壊兵器に襲いかかった。
languages.original_text: It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの剛運もそこで尽きるかと思われたが、オプティコン-22のスキタリとトールバルドのスペースウルフたちが戦いに加わった。争いを忘れ、ふたりの司令は不浄の破壊兵器に襲いかかった。

languages.text: Parecía que la suerte de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán estaba a punto de agotarse cuando los Skitarii de Opticon-22 y los Lobos Espaciales de Thorbald acudieron al combate. Dejando a un lado sus rencillas, ambos comandantes asaltaron al blasfemo ingenio aniquilador.
languages.original_text: It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

traits.locale_text: Parecía que la suerte de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán estaba a punto de agotarse cuando los Skitarii de Opticon-22 y los Lobos Espaciales de Thorbald acudieron al combate. Dejando a un lado sus rencillas, ambos comandantes asaltaron al blasfemo ingenio aniquilador.

languages.text: Es schien, dass das gewaltige Glück des Lord Captains nun endlich erschöpft war, doch dann griffen die Skitarii von Opticon-22 und die Space Wolves von Thorbald in die Schlacht ein. Ihr Streit war vergessen, und die beiden Kommandanten attackieren die unheilige Vernichtungswaffe.
languages.original_text: It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.

traits.locale_text: Es schien, dass das gewaltige Glück des Lord Captains nun endlich erschöpft war, doch dann griffen die Skitarii von Opticon-22 und die Space Wolves von Thorbald in die Schlacht ein. Ihr Streit war vergessen, und die beiden Kommandanten attackieren die unheilige Vernichtungswaffe.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın mebzul talihi sona yaklaşıyor gibi görünüyordu. Opticon-22'nin Skitariuslar'ı ve Thorbald'ın Uzay Kurtları, en umutsuz anda arbedeye katıldı. Aralarındaki husumet unutulmuş, iki komutan da bu günahkâr yıkım silahını darba girişmişti.
languages.original_text: It seemed then that the Lord Captain's abundant luck was about to run out, but then Opticon-22's Skitarii and Thorbald's Space Wolves joined the fray. Their strife forgotten, the two commanders assailed the unholy weapon of destruction.
